Title: All Ladies Do It
Writer: Tinto Brass (screenplay by), Tinto Brass (story by), Francesco Costa (screenplay by), Ted Rusoff (dialogue adaptation: English version), Bernardino Zapponi (screenplay by)
Actors: Claudia Koll, Paolo Lanza, Franco Branciaroli, Isabella Deiana
Plot: A happily married 24-year-old woman who experiences an inexplicable, rather restless craving to finally live her life intensely, retells her extra-marital escapades to her husband intending to spice up their marriage.
